doc:
Henry McGee https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Henry_McGee 0 For the American businessman and academic, see Henry W. McGee.
Henry James Marris-McGee (14 May 1929 – 28 January 2006) was a British actor, best known as straight man to Benny Hill for many years. McGee was also often the announcer on Hill's TV programme, delivering the upbeat intro "Yes! It's The Benny Hill Show!". He was familiar to British children throughout the 1970s as "Mummy" in the Sugar Puffs commercials, the catchphrase of which was "Tell them about the honey, Mummy". For the_American_businessman and academic , see Henry_W._McGee . Henry_James_Marris-McGee ( 14_May_1929 – 28_January_2006 ) was a_British_actor , best_known as straight_man to Benny_Hill for many_years . McGee was also_often the_announcer on Hill 's_TV_programme , delivering the_upbeat_intro_"_Yes ! It 's The_Benny_Hill_Show ! " . He was familiar to British_children throughout the_1970s as " Mummy " in the_Sugar_Puffs_commercials , the_catchphrase of which was " Tell them about the_honey_,_Mummy_" .
